docs.title: Ordering Sales Console Application using .NET Framework
docs.text: This is a console app that manages orders, customers and products. It uses .NET Framework and C# to implement this functionality.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: You must have .NET Framework installed on your computer before running this application. 1. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/dotnet-ordering-sales-console.git 2. Navigate to the project directory: cd dotnet-ordering-sales-console 3. Run the application: dotnet run
